nycTheatreExcerpt: You may have trouble catching your breath from laughing so hard during the first act of Branden Jacobs-Jenkins's sophomore Broadway outing, "Purpose," which opened Monday at the Helen Hayes Theater. Deeply imagined and grave beneath its yucks, it unspools like a brilliant sitcom.
